clauses.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
clauses.description: The app of the service requires more device permissions than necessary. As a consequence it can compromise your privacy by accessing many functions and information from your device, such as precise location, contacts, device identifiers etc.
clauses.clause_text:
They may also collect device identifiers and GPS location data.

          I exploit solely premium quality products – you will observe these individuals on:	Pest Control Tampa

case.text: App required for this service requires broad device permissions

clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
In addition, as you browse our website, advertising cookies may be placed on your computer so that we can understand what you are interested in.
Our display advertising partners may then help us retarget ads to you on other sites based on your interactions with the OneSignal Website.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.
clauses.clause_text: We likewise may share the SDK Information or Data Segments we create with website operators and app developers (for instance, related to push notifications they send) for their advertising, analytics, or other purposes.

case.text: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

clauses.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: <li>Sometimes the SDK Information may be to perform any of the above functions, or other marketing or analytics services.

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: Your profile is combined across various products
clauses.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.
clauses.clause_text: Information may be used to resolve identities across multiple devices, such as to match IP addresses or hashed emails to link an End User across (for instance) browsers, mobile devices, tablets, set top boxes, or other devices.

case.text: Your profile is combined across various products

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: • If the disclosure is done as part of, including as part of due diligence for, a purchase, transfer, or sale of services or assets (e.g., in the event that substantially all of our assets are acquired by another party, any information we have may be one of the transferred assets) or in the event of bankruptcy

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons and device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: We use automated mechanisms, such as cookies, pixels, and other locally stored objects (such as “IndexedDB)”) that we associate with unique identifiers in order to keep track of visitor interactions with the OneSignal Websites.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: Web pages visited that have implemented the SDK, and information about those visits (e.g., session duration, time-stamp, referring URLs)

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text:
Any controversy or claim arising out of or
in any way connected with this EULA between the Parties shall be
resolved by one arbitrator, in accordance with the Commercial
Arbitration Rules of the American Arbitration Association and shall be
held in San Francisco County, California.

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
clauses.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.
clauses.clause_text: This location information is combined with mobile advertising identifiers.

case.text: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.
clauses.clause_text: For instance, we may share certain of the information we collect or receive with companies that help us with billing and payment, marketing, advertising and email marketing, data enhancement (e.g., to provide more relevant offers)

case.text: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: We share the SDK Information with service providers, contractors and other companies to fulfill your orders, operate our business, communicate with you and make available our Services and this Website.

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text: For instance, if SDK Information indicates that a particular device is frequently seen at restaurants, we might categorize a user for targeting of local restaurant offers. Or, if a user is frequently seen at sports stadiums, we might categorize the user as a “Sports Fan.”

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
clauses.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.
clauses.clause_text: We may use third party-services such as Google Analytics, in which case those third parties gather information such as your IP address, browser type, the webpage from which you came to our website, and the times of your access to the OneSignal Website.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user or $1500
clauses.clause_text: (B) ANY DIRECT DAMAGES ARISING FROM OR RELATING TO THIS EULA TO THE EXTENT THAT THE AGGREGATE AMOUNT OF SUCH DAMAGES EXCEEDS THE GREATER OF (X) ALL AMOUNTS PAID BY ONE PARTY TO ANOTHER DURING THE SIX MONTHS PRECEDING THE DATE OF THE EVENT THAT IS THE BASIS FOR THE CLAIM AND (Y) $1500.

case.text: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

clauses.title: If you're a resident of the EU or the UK, you can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service
clauses.description: Usually it's related to the right to object to data processing or restrict it under the GDPR. Users may be able to refuse the use of their data for marketing purposes for instance.
clauses.clause_text: • In addition, if you are a resident of the European Union or the United Kingdom, you can object to processing of your Personal Data, ask us to restrict processing of your Personal Data

case.text: You can limit how your information is used by third-parties and the service

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: • If you wish to access, correct, update or request deletion of your Personal Data, you can do so at any time by contacting us at Privacy@OneSignal.com.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: or request portability of your Personal Data.

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: Information We Collect

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: How We Use the SDK Information

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
clauses.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.
clauses.clause_text: <li>When required by law or in response to lawful process, such as a subpoena, or to cooperate in good faith with a request from a government or law enforcement agency or official.

case.text: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text:
Either Party terminate this EULA for any reason or for no reason at
any time upon thirty (30) days’ prior written notice to the other Party.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: You have the right to opt-out of marketing communications we send you at any time. You can exercise this right by clicking on the “opt-out” link in the marketing communications we send you or by contacting us at Privacy@OneSignal.com.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
clauses.clause_text:
Licensee agrees to
indemnify, defend, and hold the Company and its affiliates and their
respective directors, officers, employees, and agents (collectively
“Indemnified Company Persons”) harmless from and against any Losses
arising out of any lawsuit, action, claim, demand, administrative
action, arbitration, or other legal proceeding brought or asserted
against any Indemnified Company Person as a result of or in connection
with: (a) Licensee’s breach or alleged breach of any covenant or
representation herein or of Licensee’s own posted privacy policy (or
similar posted privacy statement).
or (b) any violation of applicable
law by Licensee or any other Indemnified Licensee Persons.

case.text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
clauses.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.
clauses.clause_text:
We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify this Privacy Policy or any portion thereof.
Any changes will be effective from the time of publication of the new privacy policy.
If we believe that the changes are material, we will let you know by doing one (or more) of the following: (i) posting the changes on or through the Services, (ii) sending you an email or message about the changes.

case.text: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
